title: Jerlix
author: Jerlix
content: Hello everyone. In the world of cryptocurrency, I have not been long, about a year.and during all this time I saw a lot of good projects.But at the moment I met a project called ExordeThis project attracted me by the fact that by contributing to its development, I will contribute to everyone around me in the future.After all, Exorde This is a project that was created to clean up information.Soon, only the truth will be on the Internet, thanks to a project like Exord.Exorde will analyze, structure and give the user the necessary information in the original source as soon as possible.Exorde is a web3 protocol that allows developers to collect and link all public data on the web.The Exorde protocol uses publicly available information as input: social media posts, press articles, photos, videos, and more.These URLs are processed in a decentralized data pipeline, which provides graphs that link all similar data and facts.Official site: https://exorde.network/Discord: https://discord.gg/Z43Jz9yXTwitter: https://twitter.com/ExordeLabs

comments.author: Laurendaldin
comments.body: Quote from: Jerlix on August 16, 2022, 07:32:57 PMSoon, only the truth will be on the Internet, thanks to a project like Exord.I don't want to be dismissive of this project, but it sounds a bit utopian, don't you think?
